com.android.image

类 ImageSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.image.ImageSelector

  • public class ImageSelector
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Relin on 2018-10-10.
    图片选择器，主要用于调用系统的相册、照相机获取图片，设置对应的 参数可以对图片进行剪裁，并且获取到对应的结果。获取的结果需要在 对应的页面中的onActivityResult(int, int, android.content.Intent)方法,ImageSelector 会对返回的数据自行处理。
    image selector, mainly used to call the system's album, camera to get images, set corresponding The * parameter can crop the image and get the corresponding result. The obtained results need to be in onActivityResult(int, int, android.content.Intent) method in the corresponding page,ImageSelector the returned data is processed by itself.
